page.title: 01Introduction: Kingswood area
page.content: The area is a predominantly{rural one.{Housing}is concentrated in the west side of the block in{Lower {Kingswood}and{Kingswood. { }The area could not stand as a self sufficient one since it is necessary to travel out of it for farely basic, every day requirements. The few shops, petrol stations and similar amenities there are, can be found in Lower Kingswood (south western most square). The residential area of Kingswood Warren (nw corner) contains many well-to-do, expensive properties. {Farmland}occupies all most all of the remaining area, and farming is certainly the main{employment}concern in the area. Much land is given over to grass and to grazing for cattle and horses. The only other main employer is a publishing works at Kingswood.
